official_title: To suspend temporarily the duty on certain multifilament yarns of viscose rayon until January 1, 1994.

summary.text: Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to suspend, through December 31, 1993, the duty on certain multifilament yarns of viscose rayon.

titles.title: To suspend temporarily the duty on certain multifilament yarns of viscose rayon until January 1, 1994.
